analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo hetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na aupādinnupādāniyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha …pe… āsevane
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā cha pe āsevane
cha pe vipāke cha pe avigate nava

original: Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na aupādinnupādāniyam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekādasa …pe…
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā ekādasa pe

original: āsevane cha …pe… vipāke pannarasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: āsevane cha pe vipāke pannarasa pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
